description:
Hinahoho comes from Imuchakk, and is the son of one of its Patriarchs. He used to be very timid, lacked courage and often a crybaby, until he met http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad]. After they cleared the dungeon http://anidb.net/ch84270 [Valefor], he joined Sinbad in his travels.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Hinahoho
